title: Did the ‘Shawshank Husband’ Dig a Tunnel from His Bedroom to a Pub?
subtitle: An old satire article about a man's digging a tunnel to a pub has been fooling unsuspecting readers for years.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A man in Ireland earned the nickname "Shawshank Husband" after he dug a tunnel from his bedroom to a local pub over the span of 15 years.
